body.class: home page-template page-template-templates page-template-home page-template-templateshome-php page page-id-10

ul.li: Pick up student materials on Friday, April 10 – Check your email for time slots, maps and directions.
Digital learning begins on 4/13/20. Our school building will be closed through 5/15/20.
If you have not received COVID-19 updates via email please contact bcooke@cemcs.org and check this link for all updates.
Read about School Supplies and Consumable Supplies orders for 2020-2021.
Learn about Casa’s relationship with Kaleidoscope Charter High School. Their lottery is open from 03/14/20 – 04/14/20.
Would you be a good candidate for our Board of Directors?

h2.strong: Welcome to Casa Esperanza Montessori Charter School

div.p: We are a non-profit 501(c)3 public Charter School (K-8) and private preschool located in North Raleigh*. Our programs offer a dual-language (Spanish) environment. At Casa Esperanza Montessori (“Casa”), students develop a world view that is both practical and thoroughly inspirational.

Our students are creative, independent learners, and self-directed problem solvers, due in part to our Montessori philosophy. Casa offers a multicultural experience where families may choose a Spanish Immersion or a Spanish Enrichment curriculum within our Montessori classrooms.

The academic calendar begins in late July and concludes by mid June each year. Our students and teachers enjoy three, two-week intersession vacations: fall break, winter break, and spring break. We offer childcare before and after school, as well as during the fall and spring intersessions.
We invite you to explore who we are, what we do, and how you can become involved.

p.em: *Casa Esperanza is located off of Capital Blvd, just minutes from Triangle Town Center.

h2.strong:
We are grateful for the generous support of our
2019-2020 Parent Faculty Association Sponsors:

input.script: function spider_page_0(cur, x, y, load_more) { if (typeof load_more == "undefined") { var load_more = false; } if (jQuery(cur).hasClass('disabled')) { return false; } var items_county_0 = 1; switch (y) { case 1: if (x >= items_county_0) { document.getElementById('page_number_0').value = items_county_0; } else { document.getElementById('page_number_0').value = x + 1; } break; case 2: document.getElementById('page_number_0').value = items_county_0; break; case -1: if (x == 1) { document.getElementById('page_number_0').value = 1; } else { document.getElementById('page_number_0').value = x - 1; } break; case -2: document.getElementById('page_number_0').value = 1; break; default: document.getElementById('page_number_0').value = 1; } ffwd_frontend_ajax('ffwd_front_form_0', '0', 'ffwd_standart_objcets_cont_0', '0', '', 'album', 0, '', '', load_more); } jQuery(document).ready(function() { jQuery('.first-page-0').on('click', function() { spider_page_0(this, 1, -2); }); jQuery('.prev-page-0').on('click', function() { spider_page_0(this, 1, -1); return false; }); jQuery('.next-page-0').on('click', function() { spider_page_0(this, 1, 1); return false; }); jQuery('.last-page-0').on('click', function() { spider_page_0(this, 1, 2); }); jQuery('.ffwd_load_btn_0').on('click', function() { spider_page_0(this, 1, 1, true); return false; }); });
